p: Lipid peroxidation indicated by MDA was increased on the second day with Chitosan+AA compared to the control treatment and chlorine ( Figure 7B), while increased MDA production was also reported with EO, EO+AA, and Chitosan+AA application on the fourth day. During the last day of storage EO and EO+AA led to increased MDA production, while EO+Chitosan resulted to lower MDA levels.
